UK & Europe City Stays - World Travellers Find your nearest store Destinations Our Deals About Blogs Contact Us SIGN UP UK & Europe City Stays With so many bucket list destinations located in the United Kingdom and Europe, it’s no wonder travellers flock to this part of the world year after year. Each city has its own distinct character, reflecting a fusion of tradition and innovation. From old world wonders, ancient treasures, museums and iconic landmarks to sampling local food and wine to relaxing on the beach, the UK & Europe really has something for everyone. Deal Details Travel Dates 1 Apr 2026 - 30 Jun 2026 Sale Ends Nov 15, 2025 Priced From $1,059 Enquire Now With so many bucket list destinations located in the United Kingdom and Europe, it’s no wonder travellers flock to this part of the world year after year. Each city has its own distinct character, reflecting a fusion of tradition and innovation. From old world wonders, ancient treasures, museums and iconic landmarks to sampling local food and wine to relaxing on the beach, the UK & Europe really has something for everyone. Accommodation The Address Connolly + Whiskey Blending Experience (4 stars) The Address Connolly is a contemporary, stylish hotel located near Connolly Station, offering easy access to transport and Dublin’s attractions. The hotel provides modern amenities, comfortable accommodations, and convenient services for both business and leisure travellers. Conveniently centrally located, the Address Connolly is an ideal choice for those looking to explore Dublin’s vibrant city life. Whiskey Blending Experience - Sample different types of whiskey during this hands-on and expertly guided blending tour. Taste a diverse variety of Irish whiskeys and immerse yourself in this authentic experience by crafting your own blend to take home. Rooms Classic Room (3 nights) 22 Apr - 21 Jun 26 Stay price: $1,059.00 Includes: Breakfast daily & Whiskey Blending Experience Note: Airfares are additional. Features 3 nights accommodation Inclusions as specified Note: Pricing is per person, twin or double share as specified City taxes may apply, are additional & payable direct Airfares & transfers are additional Innside by Melia Amsterdam + Henri Willig Cheese Tasting Experience (4 stars) The Innside by Melia Amsterdam is located between the financial district and bustling city centre. A perfect hotel for both business and leisure travellers, near the main tourist attractions in Amsterdam, such as the Moco Museum, the Anne Frank House or the Van Gogh Museum. Henri Willig Cheese Tasting Experience - Immerse yourself an authentic Dutch cheese tasting journey. This experience offers guests a delicious and real taste of Dutch cheese culture with an expert guide. Rooms Inn Standard Room (3 nights) 01 Apr - 30 Jun 26 Stay price: $1,065.00 Includes: Breakfast daily & Henri Willig Cheese Tasting Experience Note: Airfares are additional. Blackout dates apply. 14-18 Apr, 17-21 May 26. Features 3 nights accommodation Inclusions as specified Note: Pricing is per person, twin or double share as specified City taxes may apply, are additional & payable direct Airfares & transfers are additional Melia Barcelona Sky + Barcelona Hop on Hop off City Tour (4 stars) Melia Barcelona Sky is a striking and contemporary hotel located in the Poblenou district of Barcelona, Spain. Known for its modern architectural design, the hotel stands as one of the city's tallest buildings, offering breathtaking panoramic views of Barcelona and the Mediterranean Sea. Guests can enjoy elegantly designed rooms, a variety of dining options, and a rooftop terrace featuring a bar and pool. Barcelona Hop on Hop off City Tour - Explore Barcelona with flexibility and at your own pace onboard a double-decker hop on hop off bus. Cover the main attractions in the city and conveniently hop on and off as you please. Rooms Melia Room with Pool View (3 nights) 01 Apr - 30 Jun 26 Stay price: $1,149.00 Includes: Barcelona Hop on Hop off City Tour Note: Airfares are additional. Blackout dates apply. 05-06 May, 17 May-17 Jun 26. Features 3 nights accommodation Inclusions as specified Note: Pricing is per person, twin or double share as specified City taxes may apply, are additional & payable direct Airfares & transfers are additional Romanico Palace Luxury Hotel & Spa + Ancient Rome Tour: Colosseum, Roman Forum & Palatine Hill (4 stars) Romanico Palace Luxury Hotel & Spa in Rome is a lavish hotel offering classic Italian elegance with modern amenities. Located near Via Veneto, it features richly decorated rooms, a rooftop terrace with stunning city views, and a luxurious spa. Guests enjoy a blend of historic charm and contemporary comfort, making it an ideal choice for a romantic and indulgent stay in Rome. Ancient Rome Tour: Colosseum, Roman Forum & Palatine Hill - Embark on a 3-hour journey through Ancient Rome on a guided tour of the Colosseum, Roman Forum, and Palatine Hill. Experience the grandeur of these iconic landmarks as you delve into the rich history of the Roman Empire. Rooms Classic Room (3 nights) 01 Apr - 25 May 26 Stay price: $1,389.00 Includes: Ancient Rome Tour: Colosseum, Roman Forum & Palatine Hill Note: Airfares are additional. Features 3 nights accommodation Inclusions as specified Note: Pricing is per person, twin or double share as specified City taxes may apply, are additional & payable direct Airfares & transfers are additional Melia London Kensington + Crown Jewels of London Tour with River Cruise (4 stars) Melia London Kensington offers a convenient base for travellers seeking refined and modern accommodation in London's cultural heart, with seamless access to world-renowned museums, shopping, and iconic landmarks. Crown Jewels of London Tour with River Cruise - Join this fantastic afternoon tour with an Expert Guide who will take you on a historical journey through London, which will see you visit two of its most iconic landmarks, St Paul's Cathedral and Tower of London. Then, after an afternoon of exploration, enjoy a scenic cruise on the River Thames. Rooms Premium Room (3 nights) 01 Apr - 15 Jun 26 Stay price: $1,489.00 Includes: Crown Jewels of London Tour with River Cruise Note: Airfares are additional. Blackout dates apply. 20-21 May 26. Features 3 nights accommodation Inclusions as specified Note: Pricing is per person, twin or double share as specified City taxes may apply, are additional & payable direct Airfares & transfers are additional Le Belmont Paris + Dinner Cruise on the River Seine (4 stars) Le Belmont Paris is a stunning boutique hotel, located just a stone’s throw from Champs-Élysées and walking distance to other famous attractions. With elegantly appointed and designed rooms, Parisian luxury and personalised service awaits. Dinner Cruise on the River Seine - Delight in this Dinner cruise on the Seine and marvel the sights and monuments of beautiful Paris. Enjoy premium seating next to panoramic bay windows, a 2 course menu and glass of champagne on arrival. Rooms Classic Room (3 nights) 01 Apr - 15 Jun 26 Stay price: $1,779.00 Includes: Breakfast daily & Dinner Cruise on the River Seine Note: Airfares are additional. Features 3 nights accommodation Inclusions as specified Note: Pricing is per person, twin or double share as specified City taxes may apply, are additional & payable direct Airfares & transfers are additional Terms & Conditions Terms & Conditions: Prices are correct as at 10 October 2025 and are subject to availability & change without notice. Sales period: Valid for sale from 10 October 2025 until 15 November 2025 unless otherwise stated, withdrawn or sold out prior. General conditions: Airfares & transfers are additional. Rooms rates are dynamic providing the best rate of the day dependent on current inventory as such these are subject to availability & change without notice. Surcharges may apply over weekends. All prices are per person & in NZ Dollars. All prices are based on payment by cash or EFTPOS only. Airfares & holiday packages include airline, operational costs, pre-payable taxes & airport charges unless otherwise stated. Additional levies, government charges & other applicable fees may apply & are beyond our control. Minimum & maximum stay restrictions may apply. Selected deals are based on restricted flight schedules, hotel check in/out time & are ultimately the responsibility of the passengers upon booking to ensure flight schedules & hotel check in/out time are suitable for their needs. Seasonal surcharges & blackout dates may apply depending on date of travel. Stopovers & alternative routes may incur additional costs. Prices are valid for new bookings only. Accommodation, holiday packages, cruises & tours are based on twin share, unless otherwise stated. Holidays are based on consecutive night stays. The accommodation, cruises, airfares, coach & small group tours & any other components included are provided by carriers & hoteliers with their own terms & conditions, which your booking is subject to. For full terms & conditions visit www.infinityholidays.co.nz/conditions Experience the world differently.
